====Verb====
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[scatter]]; to [[disperse]]
# to [[evacuate]] people
# to [[relax]] by taking a [[stroll]]

====Usage notes====
When referring to evacuating people, {{zh-l|疏散|shūsàn}} is used. When referring to evacuating from a place, {{zh-l|撤離}} is used. The term {{zh-l|後送}} is restricted to military contexts.
